description: Management of non-hazardous solid waste, Garrission Petawawa
full_summary:
================================
**W6889-240166 Non-Hazardous Solid Waste Management Services at Garrison Petawawa**

*\*Reference*\*: WS4561008004-Doc4561096369
*\*Amendment*\*: 3
*\*Solicitation Number*\*: WS4561008004

**Bid Details**

*   **Bid Description**: Canada seeks proposals for a Non-Hazardous Solid Waste Management Service at Garrison Petawawa, to collect, transport, and dispose of various waste streams.
*   **Sites to be Serviced**:
    *   Main Base
    *   Range and Training Area
    *   Pembroke Armouries
    *   Bulk Waste Disposal Site
    *   Other leased facilities in the Pembroke or Petawawa area
*   **Bid Closing Date**: June 25, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time

**Contract Details**

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: July 31, 2029
*   **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Various trade agreements are applicable, including Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others.

**Additional Information**

*   **Work Site Visit**: A mandatory site visit will be held. All bidders must attend.
*   **Contracting Authority Contact Information**:
    *   Name: Wayne Cook
    *   Email: [wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19546805?extsite=MTk1NDY4MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19546805?extsite=MTk1NDY4MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Bid Submission**

*   **Required Supporting Documents**: All required supporting documents and bid submission must be provided by the bid closing date and time.

**Note**

*   ** Bid Submission**: Requires open bidding. The bid closing
